m_szDocTitle: Tesla Power Train Lifetime Goal = 1 Million Miles! | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Power Train Lifetime Goal = 1 Million Miles! Originally published on EV Obsession . With all the hype about the new Tesla Model S Ludicrous mode and its record-breaking sprint to 60 mph (see this , this , and this ), it seems that most of us have glossed over a bigger announcement. The first line under “Luuudicrous Mode” in Elon Musk’s blog post reads like this: “While working on our goal of making the power train last a million miles, we came up with the idea for an advanced smart fuse for the battery.” Wait a second, what? One million miles? As “ onesecond ,” who highlighted this line
